text: 2:16 Matyu 11:19; Luk 15:1-2Me apavɨra itima, Judan Arazibagh fozir gumazir maba, me uaghan Farisiba, me an ganigha, an suren gumazibar azangsɨsi, “A manmaghsua dagɨaba isir gumaziba ko arazir kurabagh amir gumaziba koma api?”2:16 Farisibar arazir avɨriba iti. Gumazamizir men arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨziba me kamaghɨn gɨnɨghnɨsi, me Godɨn damazimɨn derazir puvatɨ. Farisiba kamaghɨn dagɨaba isir gumazibagh nɨghnɨsi, me Romɨn gavman bagha dagɨaba isi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, me uaghan Godɨn damazimɨn derazir puvatɨ. Me kamaghɨn amuava Romɨn gumaziba ko arazir kurabagh ami.
